Wavi Labs LLC

The future of software construction

Wavi Labs is working on changing the way humans build, use, and think about software.

Why Wavi Labs?

Rapid
Prototyping

We can help take your idea to the proof-of-concept stage rapidly with our software design methodology. Our goal is to help clients satisfy their technological needs with minimal friction.

Functional
Programming

At Wavi Labs, we use functional programming languages as the primary "material" for building software. Functional programming allows us to add features quickly while keeping bugs low.

Software
Craftsmanship

We treat software as a craft and strive everyday to get better at what we do. Everything, from our tools to communication methods, are developed to help us build the best software possible.

Learn More

Pushing the boundaries

We are constantly striving to push the boundaries of what's possible in software engineering. We believe that software engineering is in its' infancy compared to other engineering disciplines, so we want to bring correctness and maturity to the field.






We Love Open-source

Open-source software is a large part of what allows us to build the best software possible for our clients. We give back to the open-source community through code contributions and maintaining the open-source software that keep us going.

Our Process

  • Consult

    Get to know us and tell us the scope of your problem. We use this stage to see if we are a good fit for a potential client. If either one of us isn't comfortable with moving forward, Wavi Labs can recommend you to one of our trusted partners based on your needs.

  • Prototype

    Once we've come to an agreement on the scope of the project, a contract will be signed and we will begin prototyping the product. This is usually only necessary for projects of a larger scale, or for products that need to be formally verified.

  • Craft

    During this phase we will be crafting your product according to the specification outlined during the consulting phase. We will have a usable, working version of your product for you to try every week. This way, you can see the progress we've made and adjust the product specification.

  • Maintain

    Once the product is crafted it will be deployed using one of our reliable cloud service providers. The client can then decide to maintain it, pay someone else to maintain it, or continue to have Wavi Labs manage your product.
